body_text:
What is the name of the manga which features a girl with the power to read dead languages? It's a manga where one of the main characters is a girl who as the power to read dead languages. This ability has emence power and because of this she as adopted seven powerful split personalities. Each one has their own ability to protect her from anyone who wishes to use her power for evil. 
For further more protection she is sent to a school where she meet a young man who's name I cant remember. In school the boy seems very weak and passive on every situation, but outside of school he turns out to be an extremely powerful solider.
Please help me with naming this manga. I would greatly appreciate it.

An action and ecchi manga about a girl who has multiple personalities, whose body also changes whenever she changes her personality I think the genre of this manga is action, ecchi, and supernatural.
The main girl has multiple personalities, and every time she changes her personality, her body changes, too.
I remember in the first chapter, as she was being chased by some people, she ended up transforming (or like I said, changed her personality) and killed them.
Well, that's all that I can remember. Please help me find this manga.
